attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Big Brother
attributes.description: Geoff pretends to be Jack's savior in this round of Spec Ops in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Together they hit up the Bravo Op, "Big Brother."

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Charlie - Hidden
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make another run through Spec Ops in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. This time they hit up the Charlie Op "Hidden." Enjoy watching them stumble their way through the mission.

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Just In The Nick of Time
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff grab the "Just in the Nick of Time" achievement in Bayonetta. Geoff also tries to fashion his hair into a t-shirt.

attributes.title: Bayonetta - You Want to Touch Me? & Nice Try
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do their best to touch Bayonetta and pick up these witch-time related achievements. Included are "You Want to Touch Me" and "Nice Try." Nice try indeed.

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Alfheim Locations 1 - 12
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack guide you through Bayonetta picking up the first twelve Alfheims. Is Alfheim the German version of the alien from Melmac

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Tread Not So Softly, Higher & Higher
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to pick up the "Tread Not So Softly" and "Higher And Higher" achievements in the game Bayonetta. Did you know the masculine version of "Bayonetta" is actually "Bayonetto"

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Touch And It Will (Really) Hurt, Nice And Relaxed
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff try to touch Bayonetta and get really hurt in this achievement guide. Included are "Touch And It Will Hurt," "Touch And It Will Really Hurt," and "Nice And Relaxed." So many achieveables!

attributes.title: Darksiders - Open Air Parking
attributes.description: Gus shows you how to get the Open Air Parking achievement in Darksiders

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Alfheim Locations 13 - 21
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the locations of Alfheim's #13 thru #21 in Bayonetta. You must complete the levels after you find them, and once you get all 21 you should get "The Path To The Heavens" achievement. Good luck!

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day - Mask Creator Help
attributes.description: Jack shows you how to get your custom-created mask from the Army of Two website on to your character in the game itself. Fascinating!

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day - The Truth Is Right Here
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the location of every single freaking radio in Army of Two: The 40th Day and pick up "The Truth Is Right Here" achievement in the process. So many radios, so little time.

attributes.title: Bayonetta - Alfeim #1 walkthrough
attributes.description: Finchlynch shows us how to beat the first Alfeim in Bayonetta. Only a billion to go!

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day - Grenadier
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff commit a horrible horrible act in order to pick up a measly 10 gamerscore. Watch this guide for "Grenadier" in Army of Two: The 40th Day, then weep.

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day - Touch Not a Cat but a Glove
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff wander around Shanghai shooting at poor defenseless kittens in Army of Two: The 40th Day to pick up the "Touch Not a Cat, But a Glove" achievement. What does that even mean

attributes.title: Army of Two: The 40th Day - Full Arsenal
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff poke around Army of Two: The 40th Day and pick up all of the hidden weapon add-ons scattered throughout. It's like the Willy Wonka of ammunition.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Charlie - Snatch & Grab
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finally get around to running the Spec Op "Snatch & Grab" in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Brace yourself, this one is a doozy.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Bravo - Body Count v2
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take another shot at Body Count, the Bravo Spec Op from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. The first time took them 16 minutes, they breeze through it here at just under 2. Hooray progress!

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Delta - Wreckage
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take to the bridge and smash the hell out of some cars in the Wreckage Spec Op in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Take that Mini-Van!

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Delta - Terminal
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack relieve this modern classic starring Tom Hanks while playing Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Follow them as they have a wondrous journey through a terminal in Russia.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Delta - Acceptable Losses
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack actually do pretty good in the Acceptable Losses Spec Op in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. Even a blind squirrel finds a nut every now and then.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Delta - Estate Takedown
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff totally wreck their Uncle's nice cabin in the woods while rocking out in this Spec Op for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. CHAOS REIGNS!

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Echo - Wetwork
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff can almost see the finishing line in the Spec Ops in Modern Warfare 2. Today they hit up Wetwork and do some slow-mo cappin' of asses.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Echo - High Explosive
attributes.description: Geoff plays dead while Jack murders some Juggernauts on top of him. Come for the team killing, stay for the dead bad guys. Oh, also enjoy the Spec Op "High Explosive" in Modern Warfare 2.

attributes.title: Spec Ops - Echo - Armor Piercing
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finally finish their last Spec Op in Modern Warfare 2. Join them in holding hands while they complete "Armor Piercing" and then cry in each other's arms.

attributes.title: CoD: Modern Warfare 2 - Downed But Not Out
attributes.description: Jack allows Geoff to stab him in the back so he can pick up a quick achievement in Modern Warfare 2!

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 2 - Battle of Forli DLC Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take you through the new "Battle of Forl" downloadable content for Assassin's Creed 2. Take a look before you pick it up! Italian women are beautiful!

attributes.title: Mass Effect 2 - Sigurd's Cradle and Agent Walkthrough
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get to Sigurd's Cradle and pick up the Agent achievement on the way

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Burning Eyes
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go to Hell! Check out how to pick up the "Burning Eyes" achievement in the upcoming Dante's Inferno. Pick up your copy on February 9th.

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Sentence the Judge
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do a bit of judicial work and pick up the "Sentence the Judge" achievement in Dante's Inferno. With this guide, you too can learn how to fight King Minos, also, how to knit!

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Judas Coins 1-5
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff stumble their way through Hell and pick up the first 5 Judas coins (out of 30) in Dante's Inferno. Stay tuned for the other 25, coming soon!

attributes.title: Mass Effect 2 - "Scannable Anomaly" Planets Part One
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you the first nine scannable planets in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Judas Coins 6-10
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue their gathering ways and pick up the 6th through 10th Judas coins in Dante's Inferno.

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Beatrice Stones
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go stone grabbing in Dante's Inferno and pick up two achievements along the way.

attributes.title: Dante's Inferno - Limbo Item Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff and Griffon walk you through the first level of Hell in Dante's Inferno. This guide includes all of the collectible items in Limbo: Relics, Damned, Beatrice Stones and Judas coins. Hope you are hungry!

attributes.title: Mass Effect 2 - "Scannable Anomaly" planets Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you the remaining eight scannable planets in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: Rapture Historian: 1-7 Adonis Luxury Resort
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us where to find the all 7 audio logs in the first area, Adonis Luxury Resort.

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 1 - Adonis Luxury Resort
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the six hidden Audio Logs in the Adonis Luxury Resort level of Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 2 - The Atlantic Express
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the seven hidden Audio Logs in the Atlantic Express level of Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: Rapture Historian: 8-15 Atlantic Express Depot
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us where to find all EIGHT(!) audio logs in Atlantic Express Depot. Don't be fooled by cheap imititators trying to shortchange you on your logs. Go with the sure thing and don't miss a single entry.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: Rapture Historian: 16-34 Ryan Amusements
attributes.description: Knuckles goes through all 19 Audio logs found in Ryan Amusements

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 4 - Pauper's Drop
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 20 hidden Audio Logs in the Pauper's Drop level of Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 3 - Ryan Amusements
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 19 hidden Audio Logs in the Ryan Amusements level of Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 5 - Siren Alley
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue wandering through Rapture picking up audio logs. This is the walkthrough for the fifth chapter, Siren Alley. Siren alleys are the loudest kind of alleys.

attributes.title: Mass Effect 2 - No One Left Behind
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff talk you through the No One Left Behind achievement

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 6 - Dionysus Park
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the hidden Audio Logs in the Dionysus Park level of Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 7 - Fontaine Futuristics
attributes.description: Geoff shows you where to find all of the hidden audio logs in Level Seven of Bioshock 2: Fontaine Futuristics.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2: All Weapon Upgrades
attributes.description: Knuckles shows us where to find all 14 Power to the People weapon upgrades throughout Rapture

attributes.title: Rapture Historian Part 8 - Persephone
attributes.description: Geoff and to a lesser extent, Jack, show you how to get the remaining Audio Logs scattered about Persephone in Bioshock 2.

attributes.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - On Site Preview
attributes.description: Jack flies out to San Francisco to check out Battlefield Bad Company 2 and talk with producer Gordon Van Dyke about the multiplayer aspects of the game. Shamu is also involved in this video.

attributes.title: Need for Speed: Shift - Ferrari DLC Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through the most recent DLC for Need for Speed: Shift. PIck up a whole litter of Ferrari's and go vrroooom! This new DLC also adds a few more achievements, so check out that info here!

attributes.title: Assassin's Creed 2 - Bonfire of the Vanities DLC
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go back to Florence for the "Bonfire of the Vanities" DLC for Assassin's Creed 2. No achievements, but lots of death.

attributes.title: Bioshock 2 - All Weapon Upgrades
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff stroll through Rapture and pick up every single weapon upgrade. They also get two fancy achievements while they are at it. Aren't you excited

attributes.title: Aliens Vs Predator - Harsh Language Part One: The Colony
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack sooth you through finding the 15 hidden Audio Diaries in Chapter One of AvP.

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Happy Birthday and Interactive Drama
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Happy Birthday and Interactive Drama trophies in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Good Father
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Good Father bronze trophy in Heavy Rain.

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Private Eye and White Knight
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Private Eye and White Knight bronze trophies in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Aliens Vs Predator - Harsh Language Part Two: Refinery
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack sooth you through finding the 12 hidden Audio Diaries in Chapter Two of AvP.

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - FBI Investigator
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the FBI Investigator bronze trophy in Heavy Rain.

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Good Friends
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Good Friends bronze trophy in Heavy Rain and talk about puking

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Got to Remember!
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Got to Remember! bronze trophy in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Negotiator
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Negotiator bronze trophy in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - VIP, Agoraphobia and Lucky Locker
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff give you a three pack of bronze trophies with VIP, Agoraphobia and Lucky Locker

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Baby Master
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Baby Master bronze trophy in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Self Control
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Self Control bronze trophy in Heavy Rain

attributes.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - M-Com Stations 01-12
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff get Bad in this Battlefield Bad Company 2 guide. Included in this wonderful video are the locations of the first 12 M-Com stations that you must explode for great glory. Stay tuned for part two where we show you where the last twelve are and also, the location of the Holy Grail.

attributes.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - M-Com Stations 13-24
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finish off the Satellite Uplinks in Battlefield Bad Company 2. They also finally break that barrier and hug each other.

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Good Driver
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Good Driver bronze trophy in Heavy Rain and talk about the Kamikaze trophy

attributes.title: Heavy Rain - Gold Finger
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Gold Finger bronze trophy in Heavy Rain.

attributes.title: Sonic & Sega All-Stars - Power Drift
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack go kartin' in Sonic & Sega All-Stars and pick up the "Power Drift" achievement while doing so. Aiai rules.

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XIII - Shiva Sisters Fight
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you a tactic for beating the Shiva sisters at the end of Chapter Three of Final Fantasy XIII.

attributes.title: Sonic & Sega All-Stars - Rolling Start
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a tutorial lap in Sonic & Sega All-Stars and pick up this easy-to-miss achievement. Don't forget your running shoes!

attributes.title: Sonic & Sega All-Stars - Gaining Ground & Wheels of Fire
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff burn some digital rubber in this guide for Sonic & Sega All-Stars. Learn exactly when to push the accelerator to get the boost off the start and pick up two achievements in the process. Tally-ho!

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XIII - Odin Battle
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy way to defeat Odin in Chapter Four of FFXIII.

attributes.title: Perfect Dark - Both Barrels
attributes.description: Knuckles shows you how to get the Both Barrels Achievement in the first level of Perfect Dark

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Hades Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Gus walk you through the first level of God of War 3 picking up special items, Gorgon Eyes, Phoenix Feathers and Minotaur Horns. Enjoy the insane visuals and the inane voices!

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Olympia Item Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Gus keep moving through God of War 3 and pick up some more scattered Gorgon Eyes, Phoenix Feathers and Minotaur Horns that were cast aside. Also they pick up a couple more items that contribute to the Godly Possessions trophy. Huzzah!

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XIII - Five Starring the Chapter 5 Boss (Aster Protoflorian)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to five-star the Chapter 5 boss "Aster Protoflorian" in Final Fantasy XIII.

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Priceless
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the locations of every single one of the Godly Possessions scattered throughout God of War 3. From coins to pimp cups, we've got them all.

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Obedience School
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff kick some dogs and pick up the "Obedience School" trophy in God of War 3.

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Gardens to Labyrinth Item Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff say hello to Hera and hit up the Labyrinth. No creepy British dude with tights this time.

attributes.title: God of War 3 - Souled Out
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff steal Hades' Claws and go to town. Then back home.

attributes.title: Final Fantasy XIII - Enki / Enlil Boss Fight
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you hot to five-star the Chapter Six bosses Enki and Enlil in FFXIII.

attributes.title: Firewalker DLC Overview
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack how you around the new Firewalker DLC in Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Just Cause 2 - Pinata Party
attributes.description: Jack and special guest Joel go crazy with the grappling hook in Just Cause 2 and have a tea party. I mean Piata Party. They get an achievement. Leave me alone.

attributes.title: Just Cause 2 - Follow Me!
attributes.description: Jack and Joel do a bit of draggin' and pick up the Follow Me! achievement in Just Cause 2. Don't try this at home.

attributes.title: PAX East - Special Preview
attributes.description: Check out this brief preview of the goodies we have heading your way from PAX East! Also, Jack gets punched by Geoff.

attributes.title: I Believe I Can Fly
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go base jumping in Just Cause 2 and pick up the R. Kelly inspired achievement "I Believe I Can Fly."

attributes.title: Chapter Nine Boss Fight - Barthandelus
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to five-star the Chapter Nine boss Barthandelus in FFXIII.

attributes.title: How to defeat Bahamut
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to defeat Bahamut in Chapter 10 of Final Fantasy XIII.

attributes.title: Cid Raines Boss Fight
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to defeat Cid Raines in FFXIII.

attributes.title: Weekend Hunt for April 10th 2010
attributes.description: Knuckles talks about a new feature hitting Achievement Hunter.

attributes.title: Stimulus Package Overview
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff jump back in to Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and check out the new Stimulus Package DLC maps. Come with us, won't you

attributes.title: Mega64 PAX Interview
attributes.description: Jack meets up with the guys from Mega64 at PAX East 2010. They gave out free hugs and kisses.

attributes.title: Sherlock Part 1 - Exhibition Station
attributes.description: Fragger shows us where to find the hidden ammo in Exhibition Station.

attributes.title: Hecatoncheir Eidolith Fight
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to defeat Hecatoncheir in Final Fantasy XIII.

attributes.title: Metro 2033: Sherlock Part 2 - Riga
attributes.description: Fragger shows us where to find the hidden ammo in Riga.

attributes.title: Kasumi -Stolen Memories
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you the new DLC from Mass Effect 2.

attributes.title: Sherlock Part 3 - Market Station
attributes.description: Fragger shows us where to find the hidden ammo in Market Station.

attributes.title: Crysis 2 - Preview Part 1
attributes.description: Jack flies out to New York City to check out the premier of Crysis 2. In this first half he interviews Frank Kitson, the art director and another special guest for this upcoming game.

attributes.title: Crysis 2 - Preview Part 2
attributes.description: Jack interviews Cevat Yerli in Times Square about his game Crysis 2. Also included is the brand new trailer that just became public! Hooray!

attributes.title: Sherlock Part 4 - Armory Station
attributes.description: Fragger shows us where to find the hidden ammo in Armory Station.

attributes.title: St. Petersburg - Canal Entrance
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack are back in action, running around killing people in Splinter Cell: Conviction for the 360. Follow along as they walk you through all of the Co-op story missions on Realistic Mode to pick up the Co-op Realistic Difficulty achievement. This is the Canal Entrance chapter of St. Petersburg Banya. Check back for more!

attributes.title: Skate 3 PAX East Preview
attributes.description: Jack talks with @Bobbybobbydigi and Cuz Parry from the Skate series and finds out a bit more about the Hall of Meat changes in Skate 3. He also learns a bit about life.

attributes.title: Russian Embassy - Rooftop
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff get tired of the Russian Embassy and decide to hop a chopper outta there! Join them on the Rooftop section of the second coop mission in Splinter Cell: Conviction.

attributes.title: Uncharted 2 - The Siege DLC
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus walk you through the new maps and gametype for the Uncharted 2: The Siege DLC.

attributes.title: Get out of the Map!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to get beyond the magical walls of the Skate 3 demo to check out all new areas! Jump a shark! Fall through the floor! Wild times! Good luck!

attributes.title: Good Start & It Begins
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through two quick achievements you can pick up in Super Street Fighter 4. Don't blame me. I just work here.

attributes.title: Jump the Shark
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finally did it. They jumped the shark. In the Skate 3 Demo.

attributes.title: Powerhouse Walkthrough
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack take a tour through the new Halo: Reach map "Powerhouse." Come and explore with us this fancy new map and the wondrous sites it beholds.

attributes.title: Sword Base Walkthrough
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a gander at the new map "Sword Base" in the Halo: Reach beta. Come with us, won't you It is a magical land of fancy.

attributes.title: Stockpile & Headhunter Gametypes
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the two new gametypes you'll experience in the Halo: Reach Beta. Aren't you excited Fresh new gametypes!

attributes.title: Black Market Aerial Pack DLC
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack lose it while trying to show off the new Black Market Aerial Pack DLC for Just Cause 2.

attributes.title: EA Canada Tour & Preview
attributes.description: Jack flies up to Canada to get a final peek at Skate 3 before it hits shelves. Check out this visual tour of the EA Canada studio in Burnaby (near Vancouver) and yet ANOTHER talk with Producer Chris "Cuz" Parry!

attributes.title: Denied
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to deny a sword lunge with a well-timed melee attack.

attributes.title: Invasion Gametype
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff check out the brand-spankin' new Invasion gametype in the Halo: Reach beta. Come with us, won't you as we gather up cores and take them to our drop ships. Also, VEHICLES!!

attributes.title: Extreme Grindage
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack get EXTREME and do some GRINDS that are so EXTREME that they pick up an EXTREME achievement!

attributes.title: Objectifier
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff hit the rails to pick up the Objectifier achievement in Skate 3!

attributes.title: In Stereo
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do a bit of training to pick up the "In Stereo" achievement in Skate 3. Git git yeah!

attributes.title: Did Somebody Get a Boo Boo?
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back, wrecking their bodies in Skate 3 and picking up the achievement "Did Somebody Get a Boo Boo" (The answer is yes.)

attributes.title: Don't be so Mayo
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff give you a few tips on how to pull off the "Miracle Whip" in Skate 3 and in the process pick up the "Don't be so Mayo" achievement. Git git yeah!

attributes.title: What About Hand Grenades?
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a swing at horseshoes in Rockstar's new Red Dead Redemption and pick up the "What About Hand Grenades" achievement. Ka-boom!

attributes.title: Strange Things are Afoot
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff talk to strangers and pick up the "Strange Things are Afoot" achievement in Rockstar's Red Dead Redemption. Remember kids, ALWAYS talk to strangers.

attributes.title: Dastardly
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff complete one of the sickest achievements ever in Red Dead Redemption. Dastardly is an evil evil achievement and I will never forgive myself for what happens to the horse in this video.

attributes.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Darkspawn Chronicles DLC
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you how to get the Ogre's Keeper and Bane of Thedas achievements in Dragon Age: Origins (Darkspawn Chronicles DLC)

attributes.title: The Gunslinger
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do some expert shootin' in this Red Dead Redemption achievement. The Gunslinger!

attributes.title: Zombie Mode
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to infest your Skate 3 world with Zombies. They won't eat your brains, but they will knock you off your 50/50 grind.

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 1
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go treasure huntin' and start picking up hidden treasure in Red Dead Redemption. Here is Part 1.

attributes.title: Avatar Awards
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the location of a couple of Avatar Awards you can pick up in Red Dead Redemption. There are bound to be more, so check back soon!

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 2
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff keep on diggin' for treasure in Red Dead Redemption.

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 3
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack find even more gold in Red Dead Redemption!

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 4
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back, diggin' up rocks and other sundries in Red Dead Redemption.

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 5
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff keep wandering into places they shouldn't be...yet they find even more gold in Red Dead Redemption!

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 6
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff wander into Ojo Del Diablo and pick up another hidden treasure in Red Dead Redemption! Hooray devil!

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 7
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack head over to Roca De Madera in Red Dead Redemption and pick up another hidden treasure! Did you know Roca De Madera means "Pretty Horse" in Spanish

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 8
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack visit the Broken Tree and look for some gold! Hooray treasure and hooray Red Dead Redemption!

attributes.title: Frontiersman - Part 9
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff head to Nekoti Rock in Red Dead Redemption to pick up the final hidden treasure.

attributes.title: Characters & Cheats
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a look at a few extra characters you might not know about in Skate 3. They also break the rules and input a couple of cheat codes! Carazy!

attributes.title: Spot Monopolist (Downtown)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are cruising around Port Carverton finding all of the "Own The Spot" locations so that you can pick up the fancy Spot Monopolist achievement in Skate 3. Thank goodness for that!

attributes.title: Last Man on Earth - Dead Center (Part 1)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you the incredibly cool new mutation in Left 4 Dead 2 "Last Man on Earth." (Part One of Four)

attributes.title: Lady Corkscrew Glitch
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff need to call an exorcist to figure out how to fix this poor girl in Skate 3. WTF

attributes.title: Spot Monopolist (University)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go back to school and show you the locations of all of the "Own the Spot" challenges in the University area of Skate 3. Get to learnin'!

attributes.title: 8 Ways to Kill Yourself
attributes.description: Check out these 8 entertaining ways to kill yourself in Red Dead Redemption.

attributes.title: Spot Monopolist (Industrial)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take one more stroll through Skate 3 and find the rest of the Own The Spot locations in Skate 3. Hooray achievements! Hooray skating!

attributes.title: Last Man on Earth - Dead Center (Part 2)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you the incredibly cool new mutation in Left 4 Dead 2 "Last Man on Earth." (Part Two of Four)

attributes.title: Last Man on Earth - Dead Center (Part 3)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you the incredibly cool new mutation in Left 4 Dead 2 "Last Man on Earth." (Part Three of Four)

attributes.title: Manifest Destiny
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack go buffalo hunting and pick up the "Manifest Destiny" achievement in Red Dead Redemption. Poor buffalo. They weren't hurting anyone!

attributes.title: Heading South on a White Bronco
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff jump on the back of a Hungarian Half-Bred and run from the law to pick up the "Heading South on a White Bronco" achievement in Red Dead Redemption. Yee-haw!

attributes.title: Last Man on Earth - Dead Center (Part 4)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you the incredibly cool new mutation in Left 4 Dead 2 "Last Man on Earth." (Part Four of Four)

attributes.title: Sunrise Red Dead
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take a look at some of the more scenic elements to Red Dead Redemption. Join us, won't you

attributes.title: More Avatar Awards
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through some more avatar awards located in Red Dead Redemption. Who wants a yellow shirt I know I do!

attributes.title: Buckin' Awesome
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go horse-breakin' and pick up the "Buckin' Awesome" achievement in Red Dead Redemption. That is buckin' sweet!

attributes.title: Bomberman
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff blow some stuff up in Crackdown 2 to pick up the "Bomberman" achievement. Ka-boom!

attributes.title: Victory Roll
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff head back in to Crackdown 2 to pick up the Victory Roll achievement.

attributes.title: Mosh Pit
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff get in to the middle of a Mosh Pit and pick up that achievement in Crackdown 2. Rock on!

attributes.title: Austin Overpowered
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go huntin' for some bandits and pick up the "Austin Overpowered" achievement. To get it you must beat the Twin Rocks, Pike's Basin and Gaptooth Breach hideouts.

attributes.title: Evil Spirits
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack go looking for ghosts and pick up the Evil Spirits achievement in Red Dead Redemption. To get this one you must beat the Tumbleweed and Tesoro Azul hideouts.

attributes.title: Instinto Asesino
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back, clearing out more gang hideouts in Red Dead Redemption. This time they mop up Fort Mercer and Nosalida and pick up the Instinto Asesino achievement.

attributes.title: Invincible
attributes.description: Fragger is back, kicking some more butt in Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands. This one is for the Invincible achievement. Kick some Ratash.

attributes.title: Orb Tricks & Helicopter
attributes.description: Jack and Gus show you a couple of tricks in Crackdown 2 to help you locate those pesky hidden orbs and also how to get the helicopter!

attributes.title: Pebble Dash
attributes.description: Jack and Gus jump from a really tall building to pick up the Pebble Dash achievement in Crackdown 2. Look out belowwwwwwww!

attributes.title: Fire and Ice, Drive By
attributes.description: Fragger from Achievement Hunter drops a couple of cool achievements in Singularity and you get to watch!

attributes.title: City Glider
attributes.description: Jack and Gus fly their way across Pacific City and pick up the City Glider achievement. ; Join them, won't you

attributes.title: Party Bus
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff catch the PARTY BUS in Crackdown 2 and pick up some gamerscore for the effort.

attributes.title: Mel Gibson calls Niko Bellic
attributes.description: Who knew these two were so close

attributes.title: Mother my Brain Hurts & That Wheel?
attributes.description: Fragger picks up a couple more achievements in Singularity.

attributes.title: First Four Hidden Eggs
attributes.description: Jack and Joel walk you through the first four hidden eggs in the new XBLA game Limbo. Join them as they pick up four achievements and hug.

attributes.title: Hidden Eggs 5-7
attributes.description: Jack and special-guest Burnie wander through the darkness that is Limbo to pick up some more hidden eggs.

attributes.title: Hidden Eggs 8-10
attributes.description: Jack and Joel are back, wandering through Limbo and stepping on eggs. Poor, poor eggs.

attributes.title: Secret Eggs 1-5
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the location of the first five secret hidden eggs in Limbo. These don't give you achievements, but they push your completion level above 100%!

attributes.title: Secret Eggs 6-10
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you the last five secret hidden eggs in Limbo. Again, these are not for achievements, but they will make your completion level above 100%. Woo!

attributes.title: Lost Planet 2: Frank West and Albert Wesker Eater Egg
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easier way to unlock Wesker and Frank West in Lost Planet 2.

attributes.title: After Dark DLC
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff skate through the new DLC for Skate 3 and show you all the spookiness inside. From the new DIY park to the Asylum, it's all in here. Boooooo!!!

attributes.title: Hold the Line
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff dive back in to Starcraft 2 to pick up the Hold the Line achievement from the mission Zero Hour. ZERRRRG Rush!

attributes.title: Starcraft 2 - Unlocking the Secret Mission
attributes.description: Gus and Jack show you how to find a secret campaign mission in Starcraft 2: Wings of Liberty.

attributes.title: Special Delivery - Lake Powell Crates
attributes.description: Knuckles, Geoff & Gus collect all 10 crates in Lake Powell for the Special Delivery Achievement.

attributes.title: Squad City Glider
attributes.description: Jack, Geoff, Gus and Kerry all take the skies simultaneously to pick up the "Squad City Glider" achievement in Crackdown 2.

attributes.title: All Battlecruiser Dialogue
attributes.description: A collection of all of the dialogue from the Battlecruiser in Starcraft 2.

attributes.title: All Viking Dialogue
attributes.description: The Viking in Starcraft 2 is a totally radical ship. It flies and shoots! Pew pew! Here is all the hilarious dialogue it spouts in game! It's almost like an Easter egg.

attributes.title: Special Delivery - Storming Asgard Crates
attributes.description: Knuckles and Geoff show off all the crates in Storming Asgard while aggravating the American Power Boat Association.

attributes.title: All Siege Tank Dialogue
attributes.description: All of the dialogue from the Siege Tank in Starcraft 2. Let's get bombin'.

attributes.title: All Raven Dialogue
attributes.description: You can use this video to quoth the Raven from Starcraft 2. Enjoy!

attributes.title: All Reaper Dialogue
attributes.description: Don't fear him, he's just the Reaper. Let's dance! Starcraft 2 dance!

attributes.title: Danny's Demo Machine
attributes.description: Iceman from Achievement Hunter walks us through the first achievement you can pick up in the new DLC for Skate 3, Danny Way's Hawaiian Dream.

attributes.title: Whispers of Doom
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff jump into the skin of a Protoss and find all the hatcheries in the "Whispers of Doom." Rock and roll indeed. Starcraft 2 ftw.

attributes.title: Arkham City Teaser
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff head back to Arkham Asylum and find a super secret hidden room in the Warden's Office that shows some cool stuff for Arkham City, the sequel. Pretty sweet. I'm the God Damn Batman.

attributes.title: Monday Night Combat - Avatar Awards
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack walk you through the Avatar Awards in the new XBLA title Monday Night Combat.

attributes.title: Seasoned Veteran
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff hit up Monday Night Combat and pick up the Seasoned Veteran achievement. Jackbots FTW!

attributes.title: Hidden Playboy Playmates in the Demo
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the five hidden playmates in the demo of Mafia 2.

attributes.title: Mutant Overlord and Gnome Avatar
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack remind you that it's totally easy to get the Mutant Overlord Achievement and Gnome Chomsky Avatar in this handy Left 4 Dead 2 video.

attributes.title: Seeing Red
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go headhunting and pick up the "Seeing Red" achievement in Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light, the new XBLA title.

attributes.title: Level 2 Red Skulls & Cars
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through level 2 of Lara Croft and the Guardian of Light to find all of the hidden red skulls and vehicles you must destroy. Have fun!

attributes.title: AHCommunityVids
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show off a new YouTube channel where you can be a part of Achievement Hunter!

attributes.title: The Professional
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff sneak around and pick up the Professional achievement in Mafia 2.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapter 2 & 3
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff start picking up some naughty magazines in Mafia 2 in order to get an achievement. Sure...we read it for the achievements.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 4 & 5
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are picking through the pages of Playboy yet again in Mafia 2. This time they go through chapters 4 and 5 and grab a few more back issues. Hot ladies everywhere! Enjoy your Ladies Man achievement.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 6 & 7
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff keep looking at the pretty ladies in Mafia 2. Follow along as we pick up some more Playboys in chapters 6 and 7.

attributes.title: Get Rich or Die Flyin'
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take to the digital skies in Mafia 2 in order to pick up the "Get Rich or Die Flyin'" achievement. Fly like a bird, far far away.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 8 & 9
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff peep around for more centerfolds and find a bunch of Playboys in Mafia 2. Nothing better than a game full of super hot naked women. Boobies!

attributes.title: Rooftop Wanted Poster (Marek Horvath)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get on the roof of the Authorized Repair Shop, so that you can grab the Marek Horvath poster, and get one step closer to the Card Sharp Achievement.

attributes.title: Wake Up Call
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff rudely awaken Leo and pick up the "Wake Up Call" achievement in Mafia 2. GOOD MORNING!

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 10 & 11
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff just can't keep their hands off the Playboys in Mafia 2. This time they go through chapters 10 and 11 looking for the centerfolds. Hotness abounds.

attributes.title: Secret Cheat Codes
attributes.description: Kerry and Geoff show you the secret cheat codes to enable zombie mode, boss rush mode, and two others in the Xbox Live Arcade game, Scott Pilgrim vs the World.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 12 & 13
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff continue the search for naughty magazines in Mafia 2. This time they dig through chapters 12 and 13 and gawk at naked breasts.

attributes.title: Playboy Locations Chapters 14 & 15
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finish off the rest of the Playboys in Mafia 2. Fifty collectibles and 100 nipples later, we gain some gamerscore for the Ladies Man achievement.

attributes.title: Old Spice Swagger Pick 6, Old Spice Swagger Return, Very Special Teams
attributes.description: Brownman shows us how to get the following Achievements in Madden NFL 2011: Very Special Teams, Old Spice Swagger Pick 6, and Old Spice Swagger Return.

attributes.title: Zombie Exterminator
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack give some zombie killing tips for getting the Zombie Exterminator Achievement in Dead Rising 2: Case Zero.

attributes.title: Banshees, Fast and Low
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Banshees, Fast and Low Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Your Heresy Will Stay Your Feet
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Your Heresy Will Stay Your Feet Achievement in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Keep it Clean
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff wander around Reach and kill some poor defenseless animals all in the name of an achievement. PETA is going to be pissed.

attributes.title: World Record F-Bombs
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff noticed something while playing Mafia 2; there a whole lot of naughty words in it. Like, a World-Record number of naughty words. Check out a selection of f-bombs and judge for yourself. Then let Guiness judge.

attributes.title: Hidden DataPads 1-9
attributes.description: Kerry and Geoff show you where to find the first nine (of 19) hidden DataPads in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: 6 Fails!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through some community submitted FAILS in Halo: Reach. If you have a fail you'd like to see us do commentary on, send it in to info@achievementhunter.com and we'll put it in the next weekly batch of fails.

attributes.title: The Skill To Survive
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make a new friend in a GIANT TIGER named Snowflake. Awwww, wittle kitty!

attributes.title: Stick 'em up
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff make a zombie look silly! Oh man, he's got a painting on his head and a barrel around him! Hoo-dilly!

attributes.title: All Zombrex Stashes!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff point out the four hidden Zombrex locations in Dead Rising 2. Because, why do any tough work when you can just sneak some more Zombrex Booyah!

attributes.title: Father of the Month
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff find a badass gift and give it to Katey in Dead Rising 2. They do it for achievements, but really, who wouldn't want to give their video game daughter a gift

attributes.title: Tape it or DIE!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to pick up the secret achievement "Tape it or DIE!" in Dead Rising 2. Keep an eye out for those Queens!

attributes.title: Drowned
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry teach you how to drown someone in Hydrophobia. Okay, calm down, it's just a game. They wouldn't drown anyone in real life...or WOULD THEY

attributes.title: Helicopter Boss Battle
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you some simple tricks to beat the Helicopter Battle in Dead Rising 2. Yeah, Jack couldn't do it on his own. Dummy.

attributes.title: Act One Collectibles
attributes.description: Kerry and Geoff show you where to find the all of the objects and documents hidden away in Act One of Hydrophobia. This gets you that much closer to nabbing the "Private Eye" Achievement.

attributes.title: Spree Medals
attributes.description: Gavin compiles and shows you what each spree medal announcement sounds like in Halo: Reach.

attributes.title: Visiting Obama
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you a neat little bonus you get for beating Franchise mode. Say hi to "Bo" for me!

attributes.title: Come on! Follow me!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through the "Come on! Follow me!" achievement in Dead Rising 2. Pick up a bunch of stragglers and go crazy folks. Go crazy.

attributes.title: Sullivan Boss Battle
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to fight off Sullivan in Dead Rising 2. This guy is a major jerkwad. Beware his FALCON PUNCH.

attributes.title: Here Comes the Groom
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go to the wedding chapel and beat the hell out of a weird dude in a rubber suit. Just another Thursday!

attributes.title: Mail Order Zombrex
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff deliver a package in Dead Rising 2. Ka-boom!

attributes.title: Meet the Contestants
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do a bit of slaughterin' in Dead Rising 2 and kill the psychopath that shows up in the Meet the Contestants mission! Vrrooom!!

attributes.title: Kill Bill
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the Kill Bill and Supreme Sacrifice Achievements in "The Sacrifice" DLC for Left 4 Dead 2 and Left 4 Dead.

attributes.title: Custom Finish
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff get some spray paint and go crazy and pick up the "Custom Finish" achievement in Dead Rising 2.

attributes.title: Chuck the Role Model
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do a bit of hippie-hunting in Dead Rising 2 and pick off the crazy hippie in the bathroom. Nice dreads, jerkface.

attributes.title: No Mercy Comparison
attributes.description: The new L4D DLC "The Sacrifice" came with a remake of No Mercy for Left 4 Dead 2 owners. Geoff and Jack do a side by side comparison of the new/old version.

attributes.title: Collectibles Act 2 Part 1
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry go swimming through Hydrophobia to pick up the first half of the collectibles in the second act! Woo hoo! Glub glub.

attributes.title: Branches A & B
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff take you through two of the four branches of Dead Space Ignition. This is a prequel to Dead Space 2 available now on XBox Live and PSN. If you are in to Dead Space, you should check it out.

attributes.title: Branches C & D
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back in the Sprawl taking on the C and D branches of Dead Space: Ignition. Check it out yo. It's in space!

attributes.title: Collectibles Act 2 Part 2
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry knock out the remaining collectibles in Act 2 of Hydrophobia.

attributes.title: Collectibles Act 3
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry show you where to find the collectibles in Act 3 of Hydrophobia.

attributes.title: Home Run /  Home Run God
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you an easy place to knock out the Home Run and Home Run God Achievements iN Vanquish.

attributes.title: Hidden Pangloss Statues Act One
attributes.description: Fragger shows you where to find the 18 hidden Pangloss statues hidden in Acto One of Vanquish. Grabbing them all will get you the The Best of All Possible Worlds Achievement.

attributes.title: Know When To Fold Them (Caravan Explanation)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do their best to explain the game Caravan in Fallout: New Vegas. Seriously, they do their best. If you still don't understand, hopefully someone in the comments can help.

attributes.title: Beer, Poker and Fallout 3
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff find some more Easter Eggs in Fallout: New Vegas. This time they pick up some cool Fallout 3 eggs, a strange game of poker and more!

attributes.title: Stakross Medal of Excellence
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff dive in to Star Wars: Force Unleashed 2 and pick up the Stakross Medal of Excellence achievement. Be excellent to each other.

attributes.title: Kamfetti & It Burns!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do some more terrible deeds in Star Wars: Force Unleashed 2. ;This time they pick up the level 1 achievements "Kamfetti" and "It Burns!"

attributes.title: I Am the Key Master Part One
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find the first 8 of 54 hidden keys in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Guybrush Threepkiller
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff show you how to pick up the "Guybrush Threepkiller" costume in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed 2. Play as your favorite Monkey Island character in a Galaxy Far Far Away.

attributes.title: Valet & Return to Sender
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff toss some stuff at AT-MPs and pick up a couple of achievements in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed 2.

attributes.title: Strike! & Break the Bank
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff smash up some Stormtroopers and Slot Machines to pick up a couple of achievements in the second level of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed. Smashy smashy!

attributes.title: I Am the Key Master Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find 10 more hidden keys in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Globe Trotter
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff travel around the Mohave in Fallout: New Vegas and pick up the "Globe Trotter" achievement. Don't break them!

attributes.title: East Hare Egg
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you how to find a very cool little easter egg in Fable 3, the "East Hare Egg."

attributes.title: Pelican & Phantom
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry show you how to get on board of the Pelican and Covenant Phantom flying machines! Holy balls awesomeness!

attributes.title: Mighty Blow
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry show you how to pick up the "Mighty Blow" achievement with Ralf in King of Fighters 2002 Ulnlimited Match, now available on Xbox Live. What a mouthful.

attributes.title: Kyo, Benimaru, Daimon, Iori, Mature, Vice
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry walk you through the first batch of King of Fighters 2002 Unlimited Match and show off their Max and Max2 moves. In this video we have Kyo, Benimaru, Daimon, Iori, Mature & Vice. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Jump the Shark!
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do the unthinkable. They have made their first ever Kinect achievement guide. Check out how to pick up the "Jump the Shark!" achievement in Kinect Adventures.

attributes.title: Weathered 10 MM Pistol Glitch
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff show you a really weird and interesting glitch involving the Weathered 10 MM Pistol and a lazer site in Fallout: New Vegas.

attributes.title: Chupathingy & Fan Service
attributes.description: Geoff and Kerry show you how to find the rest of the mythical creatures in Red Dead Redemption Undead Nightmare including the Four Horses of the Apocalypse, the Chupacabra and the Unicorn. Bonus at the end!

attributes.title: Undead Treasure Hunter Challenge
attributes.description: Kerry and Jack show you where to find the five hidden treasures in the Undead NIghtmare DLC for Red Dead Redemption, to help you complete the Undead Treasure Hunter Challenge.

attributes.title: Operation 40 & Vorkuta Hidden Intel (Levels 1 & 2)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through the first couple of levels in Call of Duty: Black Ops and find the hidden intel. Included in this video are the levels Operation 40 and Vorkuta.

attributes.title: Executive Order & S.O.G. Hidden Intel (Levels 4 & 5)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff dive back in to Call of Duty: Black Ops and wander through the Executive Order and S.O.G. Levels finding all of the hidden intel.

attributes.title: The Defector & Numbers Hidden Intel (Levels 6 & 7)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack are back, looking for more of the elusive intel in Call of Duty: Black Ops. This time they check out the levels The Defector and Numbers.

attributes.title: Project Nova & Victor Charlie Hidden Intel (Levels 8 & 9)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff can't get enough intel and keep searching for the hidden kind in Call of Duty: Black Ops. This time they dig in to Project Nova and Victor Charlie.

attributes.title: Crash Site & WMD Hidden Intel (Levels 10 & 11)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are almost finished with the hidden intel in Call of Duty: Black Ops. This time they find the hidden tape decks in the levels Crash Site and WMD.

attributes.title: Payback & Rebirth Hidden Intel (Levels 12 & 13)
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack are so close to finding all of the hidden intel in Call of Duty: Black Ops. This time they go through the levels Payback and Rebirth while keeping a keen eye out for more hidden intel.

attributes.title: Revelations & Redemption Hidden Intel (Levels 14 & 15)
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff finish off the rest of the hidden intel in Call of Duty: Black Ops. Follow along as they spot the final hidden items in Revelations and Redemption. Keep in mind, there be spoilers ahead!

attributes.title: Criterion Visit
attributes.description: Jack makes his way to London to check out Criterion games and get his dirty paws on Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit. Check out this early look and interviews with developers!

attributes.title: Gnome Invasion Part One
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 50 gnomes hidden around Albion to get the Gnome Invasion Achievement in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Spring Cleaning
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack stumble their way through getting the Spring Cleaning Achievement in Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood.

attributes.title: Gladiator
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff walk you through a Romulus Den in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and pick up the "Gladiator" achievement. Geoff REALLY likes Gladiators. Not sure why.

attributes.title: Amen
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff get all religious and pick up the "Amen" achievement in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood.

attributes.title: Plumber
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff put on their plumbing belts and grab the Plumber achievement in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood.

attributes.title: One-Man Wrecking Crew
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff just love them some Romulus cave thingys. Follow along with them as they pick up the three Borgia flags in this one.

attributes.title: Undertaker 2.0
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff do their best to immitate the wrestler of the same name. Naw, just kidding. They just go hit up another Romulus thing in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood.

attributes.title: World's Worst Street Performer
attributes.description: It's not really an easter egg per say, but Geoff and Jack show you the worst street performer in the world, and what they do in Renaissance era Rome to hecklers.

attributes.title: Golden Boy
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go back to the very first Romulus cave and find the three flags buried within. That does it for all of the Borgia flags not on the normal map! Hooray!

attributes.title: Rift Solution 1
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 2
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 3
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 4
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 5
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 6
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 7
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 8
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 9
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Rift Solution 10
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff go through a rift in Assassin's Creed Brotherhood and show you how to come out on the other side in one piece.

attributes.title: Fishing in Halo: Reach
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to kill some time between games on the new Noble Map-pack map, Tempest.

attributes.title: Gnome Invasion Part Two
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you where to find the 50 gnomes hidden around Albion to get the Gnome Invasion Achievement in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Gnome Invasion Part Three
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find the 50 gnomes hidden around Albion to get the Gnome Invasion Achievement in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Gnome Invasion Part Four
attributes.description: Geoff and Griffon show you where to find the 50 gnomes hidden around Albion to get the Gnome Invasion Achievement in Fable 3.

attributes.title: Rest in Pieces and Go ahead against the wall
attributes.description: Geoff and Gus show you how to get the Rest in Pieces and Go ahead against the wall Achievements in SBK X.

attributes.title: First Flights in Orgrimmar
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff discuss the finer points of PvE servers vs. PvP servers in World of Warcraft while a piece of WoW history takes place on the screen. Enjoy!

attributes.title: How To: Archaeology
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back in the World of Warcraft: Cataclysm showing you how to use the new secondary profession, Archaeology. Jones would be proud.

attributes.title: Tarzan, Frequent Flyer, That's Gotta Hurt
attributes.description: Geoff and Jack show you how to get the following Achievements in the Xbox Live Arcade game, Crash Course: Tarzan, Frequent Flyer, and That's Gotta Hurt.

attributes.title: Share the Joy, Wet in the Vette
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff burn some rubber and show you how to pick up the "Share the Joy" and "Wet in the Vette" achievements in Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit.

attributes.title: Imprezive, Flight of the Bumblebee
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff return to Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit to pick up a couple more achievements. This time they go for "Imprezive" and "Flight of the Bumblebee." Enjoy!

attributes.title: Endor Holocrons
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff are back in another Holocron gathering guide for a Star Wars: Force Unleashed title. This time they find the three hidden holocrons in the Endor DLC that just hit. Enjoy!

attributes.title: Returning the Favor, Sith Kicker
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff attempt to pet some Ewoks with their boots. Oh snap! They actually punt them in the face. They also chuck grenades at some dudes too. A pretty good day's work.

attributes.title: Would You Kindly STFU?
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry check out the new Vietnam DLC for Battlefield: Bad Company 2 and pick up the achievement "Would You Kindly STFU" in the process! Who would have ever guessed destruction could be this fun!

attributes.title: Help!
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry wander around the magical World of Keflings and pick up the "Help!" achievement. (I need somebody to...)

attributes.title: Go Ahead And Jump
attributes.description: Jack and Kerry once again enter A World of Keflings and find out that Kerry has a surprising lack of music knowledge.

attributes.title: Failure Breeds Success
attributes.description: Jack and Geoff run you through Vanquish to pick up Jack's Secret Santa Achievement.

attributes.title: Where Credit is Due
attributes.description: Brownman takes on his "Secret Santa" achievement today with Limbo's "Where Credit is Due" achievement. Enjoy!
